name: Invader Zim Quiz | Invader Zim | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is Professor Membrane's excuse for not listening to Dib in 'The Nightmare Begins'?
questions.explanation:
He's making toast.

	Membrane has done more than make normal toast. In 'Future Dib', he is revealed as the inventor of 'Super Toast'.

questions.text: In 'Game Slave 2', what game does Gaz play?
questions.explanation:
Vampire Piggy Hunter.

	The end of the episode created a controversy about Jhonen Vasquez (the creator of the show) and how dark he was. Imagine the scene after the words 'The End' had never been put in. Voila! Original ending. This was not accepted by Nickelodeon or the FCC.

questions.text: What is a Squeedly-spooge presumed to be?
questions.correct: The main (and only) organ in the Irken body
options: An advanced piece of Irken technology
questions.explanation:
The main (and only) organ in the Irken body.

	Zim first mentions a squeedly-spooge in the episode 'Dark Harvest', which confuses Dib. He tells Gaz about it, causing her to make the comment "I have a squeedly-spooge."

questions.text: In the episode 'Game Slave 2', a character named Iggins makes an appearance. What other episode can he be seen in?
questions.explanation:
Walk For Your Lives.

	Iggins can be seen being pinned to a police car by a police officer. He says "This'll teach you to stand around and do nothing!"

questions.text: What is the name of Dib and Zim's teacher?
questions.explanation:
Mrs. Bitters

	It is completely debatable whether or not Mrs. Bitters is human. It is also debatable whether or not she's sane.

questions.text: What is Dib's nickname in his secret organization?
questions.explanation:
Agent Mothman.

	The Mothman is a supernatural creature that was reportedly seen several times a matter of years ago. Whether or not these stories are true is completely debatable.

questions.text: In 'Attack of the Idiot Dog Brain', how long is GIR in the house's systems?
questions.explanation:
1 year.

	GIR spent the entire year showing Zim several pointless TV shows and commercials.

questions.text: Which of the following do the Tallest not enjoy?
questions.explanation:
Talking to Zim.

	The Tallest severely dislike Zim because he is short and because of what he did in 'Operation Impending Doom I'.

questions.text: In the intro sequence, a certain scene can feature one of three different situations. Which is not one of them?
options: Zim walking GIR (who is sucking on a fire hydrant)
Zim getting hit by a dodgeball
questions.explanation:
Zim fighting with Dib.

	The sequence is followed by the Invader Zim logo and Zim laughing maniacally.

questions.text:
Which of the following characters is based on a character from one of Vasquez's comics?
(Note: Vasquez is the creator of the show.)
questions.explanation:
Mrs. Bitters

	Mrs. Bitters was a teacher (of course) in one of Vasquez's comics that he wrote before creating the show. On Invader Zim, she was drawn in less detail so as not to scare young viewers. Iggins probably already did that. Hahaha.
